select * from menu where 1=1
and menuname like '%${mname}%'
and status like '%${msta}%'
order by createtime desc
select * from menu m,type1 t,type_menu tm where m.menuid=tm.menuid and tm.typeid=t.typeid and m.menuname like #{menuname}
SELECT menuname, sell_num FROM menu WHERE YEAR (createTime) = YEAR (SYSDATE()) AND MONTH (createTime) = MONTH (SYSDATE()) AND sell_num > 0 AND status='上架'

SELECT m.menuname, sum(ord.menu_num) FROM type1 t, type_menu tm, menu m, order_detail ord WHERE t.typeid = tm.typeid AND tm.menuid = m.menuid AND m.menuid = ord.menuid AND t.`name` = '新菜推荐' AND m.`status` = '上架' AND ord.`status` != '已取消' GROUP BY m.menuname
